card.name: Royal Bravery
card.description: Shuffle your hand back into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards and give them -1 {{COST}}.

description.now: Shuffle your hand back into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards and give them -1 {{COST}}.
description.prev: Give an ally monster +1/+1, then deal its {{ATK}} as {{DMG}} to the monster in front of it.
